Our Product: Sanifu

Sanifu enables manufacturers and distributors to automate the entry of sales orders from emails and WhatsApp into their ERP systems. By extracting customer order details from various formatsâincluding emails, PDFs, and handwritten notesâand accurately entering the data into ERP systems, Sanifu significantly reduces manual data entry time and errors. This automation enhances overall efficiency for businesses, allowing them to scale more effectively and focus on core operations. We are targeting a market of 180,000 manufacturers and distributors across Africa, representing a $2.5B+ opportunity.

##  Automate orders coming into Email 
  * Email to ERP


![cover-bg](https://docusift.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Email-to-Erp-.3.gif)
From Email to ERP/CRM 
Customers send their orders to your company sales email in any format. Sanifu is integrated to the email, automatically picks new emails, gets order details and creates it into the integrated ERP/CRM. 
  * Typed or Scanned PDF LPO Email Attachments: Purchase Orders generated from your customer's own systems and sent to your email as pdf.
  * Email Body Text: Orders directly typed into email body by your customers in natural language. 


  * [ Request Demo ](https://www.sanifu.ai/</book-a-demo>)


##  Automate orders coming into WhatsApp 
  * WhatsApp Text Message to Excel
  * WhatsApp Handwritten Image to Excel


![cover-bg](https://docusift.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/whatsapp-text-to-export-3.gif)
WhatsApp Message Orders 
Customers can simply send their order requests in natural language to WhatsApp. Sanifu automatically picks the message, checks if it is an order and if so, gets and matches the order details. A single click exports the order details into excel - in a format of your own choosing. 
  * Natural Language: Sanifu understands human language and needs no templates. It can extract order details from any human message in any structure/format
  * Human-level understanding: The same way a human would interpret a normal message is how Sanifu interprets it. This includes understanding phrases like "tomorrow"


  * Request Demo 


![cover-bg](https://docusift.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/whatsapp-image-to-export-0.3x.gif)
WhatsApp Handwritten Image Orders 
Customers simply write their order in a notebook, takes a picture of the page and sends it to your WhatsApp. DocuSift automatically reads the content of the image, checks if it is an order and if so, gets and matches the order details. A single click exports the order details into excel - in a format of your own choosing. 
  * Handwriting Recognition: DocuSift uses AI to recognise various handwritings 
  * Image Understanding: DocuSift can identify an image sent on WhatsApp and read its content as if it were human 


  * [ Request Demo ](https://www.sanifu.ai/</book-a-demo>)

### Overview of Patika and Its Product, Sanifu

Patika, founded in 2021, is a dynamic startup located in Nairobi, Kenya. It specializes in automating the entry of sales orders from emails and WhatsApp into ERP systems through its flagship product, Sanifu. Patika is a proud member of Y Combinator's Summer 2022 batch.

#### Mission
The company’s primary goal is to streamline the procurement process for manufacturers and distributors. Sanifu helps automate the daunting task of manually entering sales orders, reducing both time and human error. This solution is especially targeted toward the expansive market of around **180,000 manufacturers and distributors across Africa**, translating to a significant opportunity of over **$2.5 billion**.

#### The Founders
Patika is founded by **Sidney** and **Phelix**, who boast a decade-long friendship that started during a leadership program by Mastercard and Equity Bank. Together, they have over five years of experience in building payments platforms and have successfully processed approximately **$10 million in monthly gross transaction volume** across East Africa.

#### How Sanifu Works
Sanifu provides an intuitive interface for automating the following functions:

- **Identifying Orders**: It scans through emails and WhatsApp messages to filter legitimate orders from various formats, such as typed messages, PDFs, or even handwritten notes.
- **Extraction & Matching**: It extracts key customer details and matches them with product codes in the ERP system, ensuring accuracy.
- **Exporting to ERP or CRM**: Once matched, Sanifu automatically populates these orders into the chosen integrated ERP or CRM system, dramatically reducing processing time.

This automation is not just efficient; it enhances overall business productivity, allowing teams to focus on more strategic tasks rather than repetitive data entry. 

#### Key Features of Sanifu
- **Email Integration**: Automatically processes incoming orders sent via email, regardless of format (text or PDF).
- **WhatsApp Functionality**: Orders sent through WhatsApp are similarly processed, whether they use natural language or handwritten notes sent as images.
- **Support for Unstructured Data**: Sanifu can handle various types of documents, including scanned and handwritten materials.
- **Broad Compatibility**: It integrates with a wide range of platforms, including popular services like Google Mail, Microsoft products, and ERP systems from major vendors like SAP and Oracle.

#### Team and Support
The Patika team consists of **five employees**, guided by Group Partner **Michael Seibel** from Y Combinator, who provides valuable mentorship and support.

#### Conclusion
Patika is spearheading a much-needed transformation in the workflow of African manufacturers and distributors, making sales order management not only simpler but faster and error-free. If you're in this space, considering an automation partner like Sanifu could significantly enhance your operational efficiency.

For more information, you can visit their website: [Sanifu](https://www.sanifu.ai).
